info.description:
The API for TaskPro Service.

üß∞[Backend Github repository](https://github.com/DenysShchypt/task-backend-project)


üíÖ[Frontend Github repository](https://github.com/Alexandrbig1/task-pro)


üåê[Website](https://alexandrbig1.github.io/task-pro/)


  TaskPro is the culmination of our journey through a 10-month Fullstack Development Bootcamp. This fullstack application showcases the depth of knowledge and skills we've acquired in building robust and feature-rich web applications.
  

üì≤[Find out more about uor Team](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1iBWZazJHi9QtHvw1Vyw9sUz6gOfPelsSVi5HWmOpQYA/edit#slide=id.g1213a43354d_0_0)
